title: What is the core technology of water treatment? - Quora

response.answer_text: The machine is dependent on a consistent water quality, a steady target performance, and a given power budget. A 5 gpm “anything except the kitchen sink” machine can be had (at one time) for $250,000, but was a power hog, and took a trained operator to maintain it. The better control you have over the water, the less expensive the machine/process can be, and the cheaper are its supplies and maintenance.
